name: odln-cohort-3-feedback
title: ODLN Cohort 3 Feedback
description: This data contains responses from feedback provided by the third cohort of the Open Data Leaders Network. For more information on the Network please visit http://theodi.org/open-data-leaders-network

resources.name: Feedback: ODLN Cohort 3
resources.description: Feedback provided by Open Data Leaders Network members of the third cohort. The data is comprised of three quantitative questions and three qualitative ones. The average percentage is calculated out of 100% and the scale used is 1 to 5, where 5 is the best.
